dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT' as TABLE_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_tables ALT WHERE ALT.table_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT' AND ALT.owner = 'XXCNV' UNION ALL SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT' as TABLE_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_tables ALT WHERE ALT.table_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT' AND ALT.owner = 'XXCNV'

SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT_U1' as INDEX_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_indexes ALI WHERE ALI.index_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT_U1' AND ALI.owner = 'XXCNV' AND ALI.status = 'VALID' UNION ALL SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT_U1' as INDEX_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_indexes ALI WHERE ALI.index_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT_U1' AND ALI.owner = 'XXCNV' AND ALI.status = 'VALID'

SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT_S' as SEQUENCE_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_sequences ALS WHERE ALS.sequence_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT_S' AND ALS.sequence_owner = 'XXCNV' UNION ALL SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT_S' as SEQUENCE_NAME,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_sequences ALS WHERE ALS.sequence_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT_S' AND ALS.sequence_owner = 'XXCNV'

SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT' as SYNONYM_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_synonyms ALS WHERE ALS.synonym_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT' AND ALS.owner = 'APPS' UNION ALL SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT' as SYNONYM_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_synonyms ALS WHERE ALS.synonym_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT' AND ALS.owner = 'APPS' UNION ALL SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT_S' as SYNONYM_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_synonyms ALS WHERE ALS.synonym_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTES_INT_S' AND ALS.owner = 'APPS' UNION ALL SELECT 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT_S' as SYNONYM_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM all_synonyms ALS WHERE ALS.synonym_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTE_CTX_INT_S' AND ALS.owner = 'APPS'

SELECT 'PACKAGE SPECIFICATION' as TYPE, 'XX_JTF_NOTES_PKG.pks' as PACKAGE_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM dba_objects DBO WHERE DBO.object_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTES_PKG' AND DBO.object_type = 'PACKAGE' AND DBO.status = 'VALID' AND DBO.owner = 'APPS' UNION ALL SELECT 'PACKAGE BODY' as TYPE, 'XX_JTF_NOTES_PKG.pkb' as PACKAGE_NAME, CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM dba_objects DBO WHERE DBO.object_name = 'XX_JTF_NOTES_PKG' AND DBO.object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY' AND DBO.status = 'VALID' AND DBO.owner = 'APPS'

SELECT 'OD: JTF Notes Creation Program' as CONC_PROG,CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as DOES_EXIST FROM fnd_concurrent_programs FCP WHERE FCP.concurrent_program_name = 'XXNOTESTOCDH' AND FCP.enabled_flag = 'Y'
